title: News: Youth Lagoon Announces Details of Sophomore Record
body:
Boise sensation **Youth Lagoon** has announced details of his sophomore record, the follow up to 2011’s breakthrough LP **_The Year Of Hibernation_**.

The psychedelic sounding **_Wondrous Bughouse_** will be released 5 March via Fat Possum Records, Check out the tracklisting below as well as the video to _Montana_, taken from his debut LP.

Through Mind and Back  
Mute  
Attic Doctor  
The Bath  
Pelican Man  
Dropla  
Sleep Paralysis  
Third Dystopia  
Raspberry Cane  
Daisyphobia

[Youth Lagoon – Montana](http://vimeo.com/28638402) from [Tyler T Williams](http://vimeo.com/tylertwilliams) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
